name: IguaRPG
description:
Be an iguana and save the world from evil.

Features


  • Create your own adorable iguana with the charming character creator
  • Solve puzzles and get help from other iguanas to collect the 4 big keys
  • Collect precious valuables to spend on unique consumables and stat boosts
  • Defeat strong invaders with strategy and clever use of items

 

Controls


  • Arrow Keys - Move
  • Space - Jump, Confirm, Use potion
  • U - View potion supply
  • Q - ???
